activity_groups.title: Goals Management
activity_groups.description: Anchor the portfolio with clear objectives and KPIs before defining how teams work.

activity_groups.title: Performance Management
activity_groups.description: Manage individual performance reviews and team member development.

activity_groups.title: SDLC & Process Management
activity_groups.description: Codify the operating model once the targets are known.

activity_groups.title: Discovery Stage
activity_groups.description: Feed prioritized, well-understood work into delivery.

activity_groups.title: Delivery Stage - Planning & Execution
activity_groups.description: Execute against the pipeline that discovery creates.

activity_groups.title: Quality & Risk Management
activity_groups.description: Apply governance and assurance gates before anything ships.

activity_groups.title: Platform Support & Incidents
activity_groups.description: Run and improve live services after release, closing the feedback loop.

actions.name: Align team goals to company objectives
